title: Requires the district attorney to file information with the accusatory instrument when certain crimes are committed against a woman and it is not charged as a hate crime
summary: Requires the district attorney to file information with the accusatory instrument when certain crimes are committed against a woman and it is not charged as a hate crime.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3589

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. GABRYSZAK, WEISENBERG, MILLMAN, SPANO, KELLNER,
         COOK, N. RIVERA, CASTRO, JAFFEE, MENG, LIFTON, LAVINE, ENGLEBRIGHT  --
         Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of A. BROOK-KRASNY, DESTITO, GLICK, LUPARDO,
         MARKEY,  PHEFFER, RABBITT, SCHIMEL, TITUS -- read once and referred to
         the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to filing infor-
         mation with the accusatory instrument where the district attorney does
         not charge a person with  a  hate  crime  when  certain  offenses  are
         committed against female victims

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The criminal procedure law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 100.60 to read as follows:
    3  S 100.60 REPORTING BY THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY IN CERTAIN CASES.
    4    1.  WHEN A SPECIFIED OFFENSE IS COMMITTED AGAINST A FEMALE VICTIM, THE
    5  DISTRICT ATTORNEY SHALL SET FORTH THEIR REASONING FOR NOT  CHARGING  THE
    6  DEFENDANT  WITH  A  HATE  CRIME PROSECUTABLE UNDER SECTION 485.05 OF THE
    7  PENAL LAW.
    8    2. INFORMATION REQUIRED BY SUBDIVISION ONE OF THIS  SECTION  SHALL  BE
    9  FILED WITH THE ACCUSATORY INSTRUMENT, AS DEFINED BY SECTION 1.20 OF THIS
   10  CHAPTER.
   11    3. A "SPECIFIED OFFENSE" IS AN OFFENSE DEFINED BY ANY OF THE FOLLOWING
   12  PROVISIONS  OF  THE  PENAL  LAW:  SECTION  120.00  (ASSAULT IN THE THIRD
   13  DEGREE); SECTION 120.05 (ASSAULT IN THE SECOND DEGREE);  SECTION  120.10
   14  (ASSAULT IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 120.12 (AGGRAVATED ASSAULT UPON A
   15  PERSON  LESS  THAN  ELEVEN  YEARS  OLD); SECTION 120.13 (MENACING IN THE
   16  FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 120.14 (MENACING IN THE SECOND  DEGREE);  SECTION
   17  120.15  (MENACING  IN THE THIRD DEGREE); SECTION 120.20 (RECKLESS ENDAN-
   18  GERMENT IN THE SECOND DEGREE); SECTION 120.25 (RECKLESS ENDANGERMENT  IN
   19  THE  FIRST  DEGREE);  SUBDIVISION ONE OF SECTION 125.15 (MANSLAUGHTER IN
   20  THE SECOND DEGREE); SUBDIVISION ONE,  TWO  OR  FOUR  OF  SECTION  125.20

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07724-01-1

       A. 3589                             2

    1  (MANSLAUGHTER IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 125.25 (MURDER IN THE SECOND
    2  DEGREE);  SECTION 120.45 (STALKING IN THE FOURTH DEGREE); SECTION 120.50
    3  (STALKING IN THE THIRD DEGREE); SECTION 120.55 (STALKING IN  THE  SECOND
    4  DEGREE);  SECTION 120.60 (STALKING IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SUBDIVISION ONE
    5  OF SECTION 130.35 (RAPE IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SUBDIVISION ONE OF SECTION
    6  130.50 (CRIMINAL SEXUAL ACT IN THE FIRST  DEGREE);  SUBDIVISION  ONE  OF
    7  SECTION  130.65  (SEXUAL  ABUSE  IN  THE FIRST DEGREE); PARAGRAPH (A) OF
    8  SUBDIVISION ONE OF SECTION 130.67 (AGGRAVATED SEXUAL ABUSE IN THE SECOND
    9  DEGREE); PARAGRAPH (A) OF SUBDIVISION ONE OF SECTION 130.70  (AGGRAVATED
   10  SEXUAL ABUSE IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 135.05 (UNLAWFUL IMPRISONMENT
   11  IN  THE  SECOND  DEGREE);  SECTION  135.10 (UNLAWFUL IMPRISONMENT IN THE
   12  FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 135.20 (KIDNAPPING IN THE SECOND DEGREE); SECTION
   13  135.25 (KIDNAPPING IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 135.60 (COERCION IN THE
   14  SECOND DEGREE); SECTION 135.65 (COERCION IN THE FIRST  DEGREE);  SECTION
   15  140.10 (CRIMINAL TRESPASS IN THE THIRD DEGREE); SECTION 140.15 (CRIMINAL
   16  TRESPASS IN THE SECOND DEGREE); SECTION 140.17 (CRIMINAL TRESPASS IN THE
   17  FIRST  DEGREE);  SECTION  140.20 (BURGLARY IN THE THIRD DEGREE); SECTION
   18  140.25 (BURGLARY IN THE SECOND DEGREE); SECTION 140.30 (BURGLARY IN  THE
   19  FIRST  DEGREE); SECTION 145.00 (CRIMINAL MISCHIEF IN THE FOURTH DEGREE);
   20  SECTION 145.05 (CRIMINAL MISCHIEF IN THE THIRD DEGREE);  SECTION  145.10
   21  (CRIMINAL  MISCHIEF  IN  THE  SECOND  DEGREE);  SECTION 145.12 (CRIMINAL
   22  MISCHIEF IN THE FIRST DEGREE);  SECTION  150.05  (ARSON  IN  THE  FOURTH
   23  DEGREE);  SECTION  150.10  (ARSON  IN  THE THIRD DEGREE); SECTION 150.15
   24  (ARSON IN THE  SECOND  DEGREE);  SECTION  150.20  (ARSON  IN  THE  FIRST
   25  DEGREE);  SECTION  155.25 (PETIT LARCENY); SECTION 155.30 (GRAND LARCENY
   26  IN THE FOURTH DEGREE);  SECTION  155.35  (GRAND  LARCENY  IN  THE  THIRD
   27  DEGREE);  SECTION  155.40  (GRAND LARCENY IN THE SECOND DEGREE); SECTION
   28  155.42 (GRAND LARCENY IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 160.05  (ROBBERY  IN
   29  THE  THIRD  DEGREE);  SECTION  160.10  (ROBBERY  IN  THE SECOND DEGREE);
   30  SECTION 160.15 (ROBBERY IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SECTION 240.25 (HARASSMENT
   31  IN THE FIRST DEGREE); SUBDIVISION ONE, TWO OR  FOUR  OF  SECTION  240.30
   32  (AGGRAVATED HARASSMENT IN THE SECOND DEGREE); OR ANY ATTEMPT OR CONSPIR-
   33  ACY TO COMMIT ANY OF THE FOREGOING OFFENSES.
   34    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
   35  have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to filing information with the accusatory instrument where the district attorney does not charge a person with a hate crime when certain offenses are committed against female victims
